sqlMap.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rn, t.* from ( select id, smsname, sendtype, host, username, pwd, accountattr, passwdattr, phoneattr, messageattr, paramannex, sendresult, enabled, priority, retrysend, descp FROM otppms_smsinfo WHERE 1=1
order by id DESC) t where rownum < = #endRow#) tt where rn > #startRow# order by id DESC
